questions.quote: All right, nice work.  Where's Uma's number? The moisturizer smudged out the phone number.
Dump him. I can't be with someone who doesn't break up nicely. I mean, to me, that's one of the most important parts of a relationship.
That's right, you heard me. Get out! You are ruining this whole experience for me!
How do you like that? Can I turn now? Is this over? No, I can't, I can't. I'm stuck.
That reminds me of the Hatian Voodoo rattle torture! You haven't gone over to their side have you?
Yeah, that was grandma Memma's also. She bought it on her trip to Europe in 1936. Jerry, I'm thrilled you like my mutton. I was afrais you only ate . . . salad.
You know the police, they found another victim of the Lopper in Riverside Park. I saw the photo, and it looked a lot like you.
Look, I was nice enough to give you the picture. I don't like what I wrote. I don't want it up there. Now please just give it back to me.
David, this has been the worst month of my life and if I never see you again it'll be too soon.
I told them to meet me in front of my building at six-fifteen.
